scripts.lint: npm run lint:tsc && npm run lint:prettier && npm run lint:eslint
scripts.start: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/index.ts
scripts.watch: node --watch --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/index.ts
